web_snippets: Head Coach of Women's Hockey has announced that rising senior Anna Bargman will serve as captain for the 2023-24 Bulldogs.
Anna Bargman (22) F - 2024-25: Appeared in all 32 games Recorded 13 goals and 10 assists Scored two goals, including the game winner, against Harvard.
Senior Anna Bargman scored her 50 th career goal to lead the Yale women's ice hockey team to a convincing 5-2 win over Dartmouth on Friday night.
